subject: Respond for your loan approval
body:
Dear Home 0wner 

Are you still paying too much for your mortgage?. You loan has been pre-approved.

You can receive $270,000 for 
$637 per month.

Please respond A S A P.
http://ilook.tw/fcoa


Audra Olariu
Home Loan Network


Act in the valley so that you need not fear those who stand on the hill.	-Danish proverb
